Title: Celebrating the opening of the Chengdu-Chongqing Railway
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: A train in a lush landscape, greeted by peasants waving and raising red flags. The Chengdu - Chongqing Railway (Cheng Yu Railway) opened to traffic on 1 July 1952, and was the first railway to be built after the founding of the People's Republic of China.
